descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Dewayne Dedmon sends a Garry Harris layup straight into the ground.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dedmon spikes Harris’ layup attempt) 2021/10/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dedmon spikes Harris' layup attempt

videos.description: Jimmy Butler intercepts Orlando's inbounds pass and brings it coast to coast for the dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler steals the inbounds pass and slams it home) 2021/10/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler steals the inbounds pass and slams it home

videos.description: Cole Anthony gets around the double team with pump-fakes, drops dime to Franz Wagner for the jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Anthony double-clutches out of double-team, finds Wagner for dunk) 2021/10/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Anthony double-clutches out of double-team, finds Wagner for dunk

videos.description: Tyler Herro throws a lob to Jimmy Butler, who slams home the fast-break oop.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Herro lobs up Butler for the alley-oop) 2021/10/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Herro lobs up Butler for the alley-oop

videos.description: Jimmy Butler swipes the ball away from the Magic and slams it home in the final seconds of the half.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler beats the buzzer with coast-to-coast slam) 2021/10/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler beats the buzzer with coast-to-coast slam

videos.description: Kyle Lowry heaves a pass up court to Bam Adebayo, who slams it home.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lowry finds Bam for the fast-break slam) 2021/10/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lowry finds Bam for the fast-break slam
